attributes.action: To make it illigal to desecrate the Flags of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: To make it illigal to desicrate or remove any flag from the countries that represent the United Kingdom without the concent of the flag owners

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Make destroying or vandalising the Union Flag a criminal offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/719227
